verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Command|strong="H6680"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that they \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* unto thee \w pure|strong="H2134"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w beaten|strong="H3795"\w* for the \w light|strong="H3974"\w*, to cause the \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* to \w burn|strong="H5927"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*.\f + \fr 24.2 \ft to cause: Heb. to cause to ascend\f*

\w Without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w* of the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, shall \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w order|strong="H6186"\w* it from the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* unto the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*: \add it shall be\add* a \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* in your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.

He shall \w order|strong="H6186"\w* the \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* upon the \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*.

¶ And thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w*, and \w bake|strong="H0644"\w* \w twelve|strong="H6240"\w* \w cakes|strong="H2471"\w* thereof: \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tenth \w deals|strong="H6241"\w* shall be in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w cake|strong="H2471"\w*.

And thou shalt \w set|strong="H7760"\w* them in \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rows|strong="H4634"\w*, \w six|strong="H8337"\w* on a \w row|strong="H4635"\w*, upon the \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w pure|strong="H2134"\w* \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w* upon \add each\add* \w row|strong="H4635"\w*, that it may be on the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* for a \w memorial|strong="H0234"\w*, \add even\add* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Every \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* he shall set \w it|strong="H3117"\w* in \w order|strong="H6186"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*, \add being taken\add* from the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* by an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

And it shall be \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w*; and they shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it in the \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: for it \add is\add* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto him of the \w offerings|strong="H0801"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* by a \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w statute|strong="H2706"\w*.

¶ And the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of an \w Israelitish|strong="H3482"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, whose \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \add was\add* an \w Egyptian|strong="H0376"\w*, went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and this \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w Israelitish|strong="H3482"\w* \add woman\add* and a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* strove \w together|strong="H5327"\w* in the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*;

And the \w Israelitish|strong="H3482"\w* \w woman’s|strong="H0802"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w blasphemed|strong="H5344"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add of the \+nd LORD\+nd*\add*, and \w cursed|strong="H7043"\w*. And they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: (and his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Shelomith|strong="H8019"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Dibri|strong="H1704"\w*, of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*:)

And they \w put|strong="H3240"\w* him in \w ward|strong="H4929"\w*, that the \w mind|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* might be \w shewed|strong="H6567"\w* them.\f + \fr 24.12 \ft that…: Heb. to expound unto them according to the mouth of the \+nd LORD\+nd*\f*
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* him that hath \w cursed|strong="H7043"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*; and let all that \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add him\add* \w lay|strong="H5564"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and let all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w stone|strong="H7275"\w* him.

And thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Whosoever|strong="H0376"\w* \w curseth|strong="H3588"\w* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* his \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*.

And he that \w blasphemeth|strong="H5344"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, he shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, \add and\add* all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* shall \w certainly|strong="H7275"\w* \w stone|strong="H7275"\w* him: as well the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, as he that is born in the \w land|strong="H0249"\w*, when he \w blasphemeth|strong="H5344"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add of the \+nd LORD\+nd*\add*, shall be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ And \w he|strong="H0376"\w* that \w killeth|strong="H5221"\w* \w any|strong="H5315"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 24.17 \ft killeth…: Heb. smiteth the life of a man\f*

And he that \w killeth|strong="H5221"\w* a \w beast|strong="H5315"\w* shall make it \w good|strong="H7999"\w*; \w beast|strong="H5315"\w* for \w beast|strong="H5315"\w*.\f + \fr 24.18 \ft beast for…: Heb. life for life\f*

And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* a \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w* in his \w neighbour|strong="H5997"\w*; as he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, so shall it be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to him;

\w Breach|strong="H7667"\w* for \w breach|strong="H7667"\w*, \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* for \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*, \w tooth|strong="H8127"\w* for \w tooth|strong="H8127"\w*: as he hath \w caused|strong="H5414"\w* a \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w* in a \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, so shall it be \w done|strong="H5414"\w* to him \add again\add*.

And he that \w killeth|strong="H5221"\w* a \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, he shall \w restore|strong="H7999"\w* it: and he that \w killeth|strong="H5221"\w* a \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, he shall be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

Ye shall have \w one|strong="H0259"\w* manner of \w law|strong="H4941"\w*, as well for the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, as for one of your own \w country|strong="H0249"\w*: for I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that they should bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* him that had \w cursed|strong="H7043"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, and \w stone|strong="H7275"\w* him with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*. And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
